name: Hamlin Horroignis
description: Hello, hello. This is a simple free game I made to see if I could make a for the most part serious horror game.  The story revolves around a new maid that comes to work at Hamlin Manor. If that name sounds familiar it's because I've used it several times as a focal point of an attempt of horror in my games. Anyhoo, after a little time there's a series of murders and our heroine sets out to find out what is going on.
